message.body: I feel so bad about ur car but IM glad u weren't in an accident. But its very maddening I know
Yeah :-( I have a 500 deductible. I just hope they don't total it.
Let me know when you get your cards from fidelity and ally. Once you have access we can transfer money into the money market account and but the cds
I'm on the metro. What's going on?
(1/3) Sorry. Called by accident. Why r u on metro so late. Wondering what u were going to do bout ur car. They mite total. So I'll get something like I did.
(2/3) U mite be able to make the choice. Usaa is very good. Did u get a police report? Must have been a drunk driver. What a mess. My brother is so bad hasn
(3/3) 't slept in 2 days taken to urgent care. New meds not working. He's in a panic. He has that family to support

I threw up my juice this morning and went back to bed. I hope they don't total it. I would be so sad. A cop had left a note with a report number when i got to it. Poor Steven. If he goes on disability, Debbie would have to work and the boys.
(1/2) That would b a reality check for her. I always had the feeling he was taken for granted. I know. That car was great just to drive locally in. It will s
(2/2) omehow workout. Maybe ur father will help u
Juice would make me throw up if I had it on am empty stomach. Maybe u could eat something first
You can go online and see what Steven's disability benefit would be. Also how much debbie needs to work to be eligible for retirement ssi. I can do it if they want to give my their info on the phone.
I wont say anything just yet
Have you gotten any ally or fidelity mail?
No. IM concerned about a money market. I can't afford any risk. Would rather just a CD
Ok, they have a high interest savings account. You just can't write checks
I'm not going to be able to come home this weekend. Would you guys come here?
(1/2) U can't take the train for Eric's b'day?? N surprise him then we can drive u home. Think about it. We love u n its not the same w/o u. Uncle Steven is i
(2/2) n the hospital. They foundca tumor n looking at his upper spine now then a biopsy. He couldn't walk or pee. IM sick
Oh no.
I know. U never know in life. That's why its imp to spend time together w those that r imp. Hows that for a little guilt
How is it going?
Anything new?
No not yet. As soon as I hear anything I'll let u know
Can u find a good spinal n lung doctor at Hopkins. They're thinking of going to Hopkins n doctor agrees. When u have time
Pressure is off spine but still can't pee
David Ettinger - lung. Stuart Grossman - neuro. Both at hopkins, peer ranked as top 1% nationwide.
Hopkins has a special brain and spinal tumor center
She already ready has Dr. Karma for spine I'll tell her about lung guy
There transporting him 7or 8 tonite
Is he going to be in the hospital for a while? Does he need entertainment?
Don't know anything just yet.
Going to request ur doctors. Patricia researched. WOW. they r outstanding
Maybe u can give me a 2nd tumor spine Guy in case we can't get Stuart grossman
I'll ask him if he needs entertainment
Joe n Ang n maybe Robert mite b coming down to see Steven. U should visit uncle stevel also. Its embarrassing if u don't. He's in a crisis
I just picked up my rental car
Wonderful. Nothing like good ins
(1/2) R they fixing ur car or totaling it? If u go to hospital I'll meet u. There is a parking garage directly across the street n a bridge to work over. He's
(2/2) on 12th FL room 31. Mite be have 2nd surgery today. Timing is crucial. Keep in touch. Im in a panic have to clean house also
Zahedan building
